trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Venice
There were no other sightings in Venice on or around January 2nd 2009
Summary: 2 round flying UFOs way up in the stars chasing each other until gone.
divs: Sighting Detailsfisrt night i saw around 6 am a red ball of light going east then turned a sharp north.. right after i saw like a shooting star but it was there then it was gone and where it was heading toward a star that was stationary got realy bright and huge shot up and dissapeard. 2 nights later i got home from work looked up and saw 2 balls of light coming from the norh chasing each other until i couldnt see them anymore... for both events only took about 30 seconds for each event
